pages.title: Rose Hair Tarantula
pages.text: The species is also known from Bolivia and Argentina.G.$(br2)rosea is a common pet of tarantula hobbyists.$(br2)Considerable confusion exists between this species and Grammostola porteri, with some arguing that many of the "G. rosea" in the pet trade actually are G. porteri.

pages.title: Rose Hair Tarantula
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:chicken$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
